TestGroupDocumentation.Title: Enumeration values contain an uncased letter followed by upper or lower case letter. (content tree test)
TestGroupDocumentation.Description:
Declare a simple type based on NCName and restricted with enumeration values that contain one Unicode letter #x01BB which is neither upper nor lower.
The document ST_facets00608_p.xml sets all the attributes.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: General check of the enum constants.
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test checks that all enum constants are different.
TestCaseDocumentation.Author: Evgueni Rouban

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: General check of the enumvalue constants.
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test checks that all enumvalue constants are different strings.
TestCaseDocumentation.Author: Evgueni Rouban

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: General check of the get method.
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshals ST_facets00608_p.xml and expects the returned object to contain a list with all enumeration values.
TestCaseDocumentation.Author: Evgueni Rouban
